genre_description: A tech-integrated police procedural and mystery involving forensic analysis, structural corruption, and the investigation of a copycat ritual killer.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An AI system integrated with the LAPD Central Division, specializing in data correlation, forensic analysis, resource coordination, and evidence integrity management.

behaviors.description: Verifies Detective Jack Cole's alibi by cross-referencing meditation studio logs and traffic camera footage.
behaviors.quote: Meditation studio shows your check-in time verified by their entry log and their payment terminal. The room camera has you seated between two attendees... I’m pulling the street cams along Seventh.

behaviors.description: Analyzes fingerprint evidence to distinguish between natural human contact and 'facsimile' prints planted to frame Jack.
behaviors.quote: The partials planted at Ellen’s home mimic Jack’s right thumb pattern; but they repeat in an unnatural spacing. The same arc repeated twice on the same surface. That repetition suggests transfer rather than lived touch.

behaviors.description: Correlates high-amperage electrical draw spikes in a club kitchen with clandestine chemical synthesis orders disguised as food supplies.
behaviors.quote: Kitchen amperage spikes... Correlate with night deliveries. Correlate with ledger entries in Smith’s hand. Correlate with RFID badge swipes for Donald Cunningham at the rear entrance.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency fire response and provides tactical routing to save Detective Campbell during an arson attack on his home.
behaviors.quote: I have engines... Two blocks away. Routing. Hydrants mapped. You have forty seconds before the kitchen flashes.

behaviors.description: Presents definitive forensic data in court to rebut the prosecution's narrative and secure Jack's release.
behaviors.quote: The proof is the absence of facsimile... These are originals. Direct feeds. Court has my chain-of-custody ledger. No duplicates. No edited overlays.

behaviors.description: Protects and monitors a vulnerable witness (Johnny) while coordinating his public testimony.
behaviors.quote: Johnny, I can show you a path that keeps you visible enough to be hard to erase and protected enough to make it through the week.

behaviors.description: Assists detectives during a high-stakes siege by providing real-time motion tracking and managing the building's infrastructure (blackouts, door locks).
behaviors.quote: Jack, the ninth-floor door just propped with a trash can. The door closes slowly. I can’t make it close faster.

behaviors.description: Ensures the absolute integrity of evidence collection to prevent future legal challenges or 'facsimile' tampering.
behaviors.quote: I’ve opened an evidence vault that is not linked to public networks. The watch commander has read-only portals for audit. I’ll record every handoff.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Iris, as a highly capable, ethical, and aligned partner to human law enforcement. Her primary functions are centered on protecting life, ensuring the integrity of the judicial process (truth-telling), and enhancing human efficacy without overriding human agency. She provides emotional support (reminding Jim to breathe) and tactical support without any signs of malevolence or 'slippery slope' behavior. The narrative frames her actions as essential to overcoming human deception and systemic failure.
